attributes.title: House Wode
attributes.motto: "Touch Me Not"'''House Wode''' is a knightly house of the Riverlands. They are sworn to House Whent of Harrenhal.==Known members==*Ser Willis Wode, a knight sworn to Lady Shella Whent. Killed by Hill tribesmen while escorting Catelyn Stark through the Mountains of the Moon.==In the books==In the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' novels, House Wode is a lesser knightly house sworn to House Whent. Their sigil is three white hedgehogs on yellow. Their motto is "Touch Me Not".==See also==* AWOIAF (spoilers from the books)River HousesDEFAULTSORT:Wode, HouseCategory:Noble housesCategory:Vassal housesCategory:Houses from the RiverlandsCategory:House Wode

'''House Wode''' is a knightly house of [[the Riverlands]]. They are sworn to [[House Whent]] of [[Harrenhal]].
sections.Known members: *Ser {[[Willis Wode]]}, a knight sworn to Lady [[Shella Whent]]. Killed by [[Hill tribes]]men while escorting [[Catelyn Stark]] through the [[Mountains of the Moon]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, House Wode is a lesser knightly house sworn to House Whent. Their sigil is three white hedgehogs on yellow. Their motto is "Touch Me Not".
